name: Rhinotron
description: Rhinotron is a fearsome warrior, a fusion of advanced cybernetics and the raw power of a rhinoceros. He was once a captive of the tyrannical corporation, CyberCorp, who subjected him to brutal experiments. Their goal was to create a weapon, a living tank capable of crushing any opposition. Rhinotron's mind was partially rewired, his natural ferocity amplified and channeled into a single, unwavering purpose - to fight.  He was implanted with a powerful energy core and a laser blade, giving him the ability to cut through steel and fire devastating blasts.  His thick, armored hide is further reinforced with cybernetic implants, making him virtually impenetrable. Though his intelligence and charisma are limited, Rhinotron is a loyal and devoted soldier, fighting with unwavering courage and brutal efficiency. He despises CyberCorp and is now dedicated to fighting for freedom and justice.
